segments.text: Could you please cover for me two hours this morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Any specific reason I should know about in case people ask where you are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have to see the dentist . We have an appointment for this morning from 9 to 11 o â€™ clock . So if there is any phone call , please pick up for me . If there is something urgent , tell them I will be back in two hours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I will need it . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S1
